activity.title: Drag and Drop Multi
activity.instructions: Drag the correct word into each sentence.

audio.oae-label: audio file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.mp3)

question.text: If you’re in a hurry, go to Quick Cuts. They’re incredibly __________. fast

audio.oae-label: audio file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.mp3)

question.text: If you’re looking for ideas for your menu, talk to Katie’s Catering Service. They’re very __________ when it comes to suggesting types of food. helpful

audio.oae-label: audio file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.mp3)

question.text: When I need something printed or copied quickly, I always go to The Paper Shop. They are so __________. efficient They never make you wait more than a minute.

audio.oae-label: audio file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.mp3)

question.text: I totally trust my mechanic. He’s always been completely __________ about the repairs on my car. honest

audio.oae-label: audio file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.mp3)

question.text: Take your blouse to Susie’s Stitches if you want to be sure that it will be done on time. Susie is extremely __________reliable and always has things ready when she promises.

audio.oae-label: audio file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.mp3)

question.text: If you really want the invitations to look good, then I’d have them done by a __________ professionalprinting service. Don’t do them on your own home computer.
